GR14sadhdipu:2: This is an interesting text. There appear to be many original verses sprinkled
GR14sadhdipu:3: throughout the text, many of which are incomplete. Some of the verses don't follow
GR14sadhdipu:4: any regular meter and some work is needed to edit this text. Some verses are likely
GR14sadhdipu:5: quotes, but I haven't been able to trace them.
GR14sadhdipu:6: I have used Haridas Shastri's edition, and have not had access to another. It would
GR14sadhdipu:7: be worth finding other manuscripts in order to produce a true critical edition.]

GR14sadhdipu:3443: aiṃ klīṃ śrī-rādhike svāhā svādhiṣṭhānaṃ sadāvatu ||16||
GR14sadhdipu:3444: klāṃ klīṃ namo rādhikāyai maṇipūraṃ sadāvatu |
GR14sadhdipu:3445: lakṣmī māyā smaro rādhā pātu cittam anāhatam ||17||
GR14sadhdipu:3446: klāṃ klīṃ kāmakalā rādhā viśuddhaṃ sarvadāvatu |
GR14sadhdipu:3447: ājñāṃ rakṣatu rādhā me haṃsaḥ klīṃ vahni-vallabhā ||18||
GR14sadhdipu:3448: oṃ namo rādhikāyai svāhā sahasrāraṃ sadāvatu |
GR14sadhdipu:3449: aṣṭādaśākṣarī rādhā sarva-deśe tu pātu mām ||19||
GR14sadhdipu:3450: navārṇā pātu mām ūrdhvaṃ daśārṇāvatu saṃsadi |
GR14sadhdipu:3454: aṣṭākṣarī ca rādhā māṃ rātrau rakṣatu sarvadā |
GR14sadhdipu:3455: pūrṇā pañcadaśī rādhā pātu māṃ vraja-maṇḍale ||22||
GR14sadhdipu:3456: ity evaṃ rādhikāyās te kavadaṃ kīrtitaṃ mayā |
GR14sadhdipu:3459: abhaktāyāpi putrāya dattvā mṛtyuṃ labhen naraḥ ||24||
GR14sadhdipu:3460: nātaḥ parataraṃ divyaṃ kavacaṃ bhuvi vidyate |

GR14sadhdipu:3549: brahma manuṣya-liṅgam ity ādeḥ, tato'pi gūḍhataraṃ śacīnandanasya, tato

GR14sadhdipu:3551: śrī-kṛṣṇatve ārṣa-pramāṇāni bahūni santi | yathā-kṛṣṇa-varṇaṃ tviṣākṛṣṇaṃ
GR14sadhdipu:3556: channaḥ kalau yad abhavas tri-yugo'tha sa tvam ||

GR14sadhdipu:3565: śrī rādhā prema-rūpā yā purā vṛndāvaneśvarī |

GR14sadhdipu:3651: ity uktaḥ sa ca sakalaṃ nināya tatra

GR14sadhdipu:3677: nitya nityānanda caitanya govinda paṇḍita gadādhara rādhe |
GR14sadhdipu:3678: caitanya yugala-rūpa kevala rasera kūpa avatāra sadā-śiva sādhe ||
GR14sadhdipu:3679: antare nava-ghana bāhire gaura-tanu yugala-rūpa parakāśe |
GR14sadhdipu:3680: kahe vāsudeva ghoṣa yugala-bhajana-rase janame janame rahu āśe ||
GR14sadhdipu:3682: nityānanda kari saṅge gaṅgā-pulina-raṅge hari hari bole nija-vṛnde |
GR14sadhdipu:3683: kāṅcā kāñcana-maṇi gorā-rūpa tāhe jini ḍagamagi-prema-taraṅga |
GR14sadhdipu:3684: o nava kusuma-dāma gale dole anupāma helana narahari aṅga ||
GR14sadhdipu:3685: bhāve bharala tanu pulaka kadamba janu garaha-i yaichana siṃhe |
GR14sadhdipu:3686: priya gadādhara dhariyā se bāma kara nija-guṇa-gāna govinde ||
GR14sadhdipu:3687: aruṇa-nayana-koṇe īṣat hāsiyā khene royata kibā abhilāṣa |
GR14sadhdipu:3688: soṅari se saba khelā śrī-vṛndāvana-rasa-līlā ki bolaba vāsudeva ghoṣe ||
GR14sadhdipu:3690: aruṇa-nayane dhārā bahe | aruṇita māla māthe gora rahe ||
GR14sadhdipu:3691: ki bhāva paḍiyāche mane | bhūmi gaḍi paḍe kṣaṇe kṣaṇe ||
GR14sadhdipu:3692: kamala pallava bichāiyā | rahe gorā dheyāna kariyā ||
GR14sadhdipu:3693: vāsaka-sajjāra bhāva kari | virale basiyā ekeśvarī ||
GR14sadhdipu:3694: vāsudeva ghoṣa tā dekhiyā | bole kichu caraṇe dhariyā ||
GR14sadhdipu:3698: ki rasera dāna cāhe gorā dvija-maṇi |
GR14sadhdipu:3700: dāna deha bali ghane ghane ḍāke |
GR14sadhdipu:3703: se bhāva paḍila mane vāsudeva gāna ||
GR14sadhdipu:3707: gorā-aṅge keho keho jala pheli māre |
GR14sadhdipu:3711: gaurāṅga cāṅdera līlā kahana nā yāya |
GR14sadhdipu:3716: priya gadādhara saṅge gorā khele pāśā sāri |
GR14sadhdipu:3717: khelite lāgila pāśā hāri jini kari ||
GR14sadhdipu:3720: dui jane magana bhela nava pāśā rase |
GR14sadhdipu:3721: jaya jaya diyā gāya vāsudeva ghoṣe ||
GR14sadhdipu:3724: priya pāriṣada gaṇa gorā guṇa gāya ||
GR14sadhdipu:3725: āni salila keha dhari nija kare |
GR14sadhdipu:3727: cāṅda jiniyā mukha adhika kari sāje |
GR14sadhdipu:3733: phulera samara gorāra paḍi gela mane ||
GR14sadhdipu:3740: sahacara mili phāgu māre gorā gāya |
GR14sadhdipu:3741: candana picakā bhari keho keho dhāya ||
GR14sadhdipu:3744: hari buli bhuja tuli nāce haridāsa |
GR14sadhdipu:3747: rādhā rādhā bali gaurā loṭāya dharaṇī ||
GR14sadhdipu:3750: kṣaṇe kṣaṇe gorā cāṅda bhūme gaḍi yāya |
GR14sadhdipu:3753: kahe vāsu gorā mora baḍa utarola ||
GR14sadhdipu:3754: gaurāṅga viraha jvara hiyā chaṭa phaṭa kare
GR14sadhdipu:3756: nā heriyā cāṅda mukha vidarite cāhe buka
GR14sadhdipu:3758: prāṇera hari hari kaha more jīvana upāya |
GR14sadhdipu:3759: e dukhe dukhita ye e dukha jānaye se
GR14sadhdipu:3761: gaurāṅga mukhera hāsi sudhā khase rāśi rāśi
GR14sadhdipu:3763: yata chila bandhu gaṇa sabhe bhela nikaruṇa
GR14sadhdipu:3765: gadādhara ādi kari nā dekhiyā prāṇe mari
GR14sadhdipu:3767: ye more karita dayā se gela niṭhura hañā
GR14sadhdipu:3769: yathā svayaṃ bhagavān śrī-vrajendra-nandanaḥ svasya kāya-vyūha-prakāśa-vilāsa-
GR14sadhdipu:3771: paravyoma-nātha-nṛsiṃha-raghunāthādibhiḥ svāvatārāvalībhis tat tat pārṣadaiś ca
GR14sadhdipu:3773: san kṛpayā prakaṭo'bhūt | tathā tena rasika-maṇḍala-śekhareṇa svasya mahā-śakti-
GR14sadhdipu:3777: śaktiś ca aghaṭana-ghaṭanā-paṭīyasī yogamāyā vaibhavena yadā yad icchāṃ karoti
GR14sadhdipu:3778: tat kim api durghaṭaṃ na bhavati avatīrya saṅkīrtanānandāveśena tat tat pūrva-
GR14sadhdipu:3779: bhāvaṃ sva-sva-vilāsa-śakti-pārṣadaṃ prati darśitavān | etat tu śrī-karṇapūra-śrī-
GR14sadhdipu:3782: sthāpitam asti | tasmāt sarveṣāṃ śrī-kṛṣṇa-caitanya-pārṣadānāṃ mate śrī-

GR14sadhdipu:3792: hāte laḍi kāṅkhe ḍāli neta paridhāna |
GR14sadhdipu:3794: ḍāki bole haridāsa ke saba tomarā |
GR14sadhdipu:3803: jijñāsāra kāja nāhi jhāṭa tumi naḍa ||
GR14sadhdipu:3804: advaita bolaye eta vicāra ki kāja |
GR14sadhdipu:3806: nṛtya gīte pīta baḍa āmāra ṭhākura |
GR14sadhdipu:3812: gadādhara nṛtya dekhi āche kona jana |
GR14sadhdipu:3815: pṛthivī ha-iyā sikta dhanya hena māne ||
GR14sadhdipu:3820: ye gāya ye dekhe sabhe bhāsilena prema |
GR14sadhdipu:3821: caitanya prasāde keho bāhya nāhi jāne ||
GR14sadhdipu:3822: hari hari boli kāṅde saba vaiṣṇava maṇḍala |
GR14sadhdipu:3831: se ārti dekhite sarva hṛdaya vidare |
GR14sadhdipu:3832: ke ki balibeka prabhu bādha nāhi sphure ||
GR14sadhdipu:3836: āpana hṛdaya prabhu cire naka diyā ||
GR14sadhdipu:3838: ārti dekhi gadādhara mane ta vicāre ||
GR14sadhdipu:3839: ei āsibena kṛṣṇa sthira hao khāni |
GR14sadhdipu:3841: baḍa tuṣṭa hailā āi gadādhara prati |
GR14sadhdipu:3842: emata śiśura buddhi nāhi āra kati ||
GR14sadhdipu:3843: muñi bhaye nāhi pāro sammukha ha-ite |
GR14sadhdipu:3844: śiśu ha-i kemane prabodhilā bhāla mate ||
GR14sadhdipu:3845: āi bole bāpa tumi sarvadā thākibā |
GR14sadhdipu:3846: chāḍiyā uhāra saṅga kothāha nā yābā ||
GR14sadhdipu:3848: prabhu bole kon jana gṛhera bhitara |
GR14sadhdipu:3854: āmāra se hena janma gela vṛthā rase |
GR14sadhdipu:3855: nā pāila amūlya nidhi dīna-hīna doṣe ||
GR14sadhdipu:3857: ei saba adbhuta sei navadvīpe haye |
GR14sadhdipu:3858: tathāpi o bhakta ba-i anya nā jānaye ||
GR14sadhdipu:3864: anyera ki dāya viṣṇu pūjite nā pāre ||
GR14sadhdipu:3865: snāna kari baise prabhu śrī-viṣṇu pūjite |
GR14sadhdipu:3866: prema jale sakala śrī-aṅga vastra tite ||
GR14sadhdipu:3867: bāhira ha-iyā prabhu se vastra chāḍiyā |
GR14sadhdipu:3868: puna anya vastra pari viṣṇu pūje giyā ||
GR14sadhdipu:3869: puna premānanda jale tite se vasana |
GR14sadhdipu:3871: ei mata vastra parivarta kare mātra |
GR14sadhdipu:3872: preme viṣṇu pūjite nā pāre tila mātra ||
GR14sadhdipu:3874: tumi viṣṇu pūja mora nāhika saubhāgya ||
GR14sadhdipu:3883: ihā kahibāre śakti īśvare se dhare ||
GR14sadhdipu:3887: atibaḍa pāṣaṇḍī se vigraha dekhi bhule ||
GR14sadhdipu:3896: duṅhu bole āji haila locana nirmala |
GR14sadhdipu:3897: duṅhu bole janma āji āmāra saphala ||
GR14sadhdipu:3898: bāhya jñāna nāhi duṅhu prabhura śarīre |
GR14sadhdipu:3899: duṅhu prabhu bhāse nija ānanda sāgare ||
GR14sadhdipu:3903: ekera apriya āre sambhāṣā nā kare ||
GR14sadhdipu:3907: dekhā jo nā dena tāre paṇḍita gosāñi ||
GR14sadhdipu:3908: tabe dui prabhu sthira ha-i eka-sthāne |
GR14sadhdipu:3915: ki bhojane ki śayane kibā paryaṭane |
GR14sadhdipu:3919: gadādhara vākye mātra prabhu sukhī haya |
GR14sadhdipu:3922: ei mata prabhu priya gadādhara saṅge |
GR14sadhdipu:3923: tān mukhe bhāgavata kathā śune raṅge ||
GR14sadhdipu:3932: aśru kampa hāsya mūrcchā pulaka huṅkāra |
GR14sadhdipu:3937: śunile nā thāke bāhya nāce sei kṣaṇe ||
GR14sadhdipu:3939: ye nā māne bhāgavata se yavana sama |
GR14sadhdipu:3940: tāra śāstā āche prabhu janme janme yama ||
GR14sadhdipu:3942: sei rātri tathāha thāki tabe āra dine |
GR14sadhdipu:3943: gṛhe āilena prabhu lakṣmī devī sane ||
GR14sadhdipu:3954: citte laya yadi tabe karaha sarvathā ||
GR14sadhdipu:3957: tomāra kanyāra yogya sei divya pati |
GR14sadhdipu:3961: śuni vipra patnī ādi āpta-varga sahe |
GR14sadhdipu:3962: lāgila karite yukti ke budhi ki kahe ||
GR14sadhdipu:3963: sabhe bulilena āra ki kārya vicāre |
GR14sadhdipu:3964: sarvathā e karma giyā karaha satvare ||
GR14sadhdipu:3969: ye sukha pāilā tāhā ke pāre barṇite ||
GR14sadhdipu:3977: tabe śubha kṣaṇe prabhu sakala maṅgale |
GR14sadhdipu:3978: putra vadhū gṛhe ānilena harṣa ha-iyā ||
GR14sadhdipu:3987: tāṅra pāda-padma vando yāṅra muñi dāsa

GR14sadhdipu:4024: kathanādhikāritvena ca tena sa ca nirūpitaḥ | evaṃ gauḍa-deśa-mukhya-pradeśa-sva-

GR14sadhdipu:4037: paṇḍita kahe yāhāṅ tumi sei nīlācala
GR14sadhdipu:4039: prabhu kahe iṅhā kara gopīnātha sevana
GR14sadhdipu:4041: prabhu kahe sevā chāḍibe āmāya lāge doṣa
GR14sadhdipu:4042: iṅhā rahi sevā kara āmāra santoṣaṛ
GR14sadhdipu:4043: paṇḍita kahe saba doṣa āmāra upara
GR14sadhdipu:4045: āike dekhite yāiba nā yāiba tomā lāgi
GR14sadhdipu:4048: kaṭaka āsi prabhu tāṅre saṅge ānāilā
GR14sadhdipu:4052: tāṅhāra hāte dhari kahe kari praṇaya-roṣa
GR14sadhdipu:4053: pratijā sevā chāḍibe e tomāra uddeśa
GR14sadhdipu:4054: se siddha ha-ila chāḍi āilā dūra deśa
GR14sadhdipu:4055: āmāra saṅge rahite cāha vācha nija-sukha
GR14sadhdipu:4056: tomāra dui dharma yāya āmāra haya duḥkha
GR14sadhdipu:4057: mora sukha cāha yadi nīlācale cala
GR14sadhdipu:4058: āmāra śapatha yadi āra kichu bala
GR14sadhdipu:4061: paṇḍite laā yāite sārvabhaume ājā dilā
GR14sadhdipu:4062: bhaṭṭācārya kahe uṭha aiche prabhura līlā
GR14sadhdipu:4065: tathā hi sva-nigamam apahāya mat-pratijñāmṛtam adhikartum (BhP 1.9.37) ity ādi
GR14sadhdipu:4072: paṇḍita kahe ei karma nahe āmā haite

GR14sadhdipu:5440: advaita-prabhu-putrāḥ śrīmad-advaitācārya-pādais tyaktāḥ | tat tu śrī-caitanya-
GR14sadhdipu:5447: kiṃ ca śrīman-mahāprabhor mantra-sevakaḥ sākṣāt ko'pi śrī-rūpa-sanātanādīnāṃ
GR14sadhdipu:5448: ca | tatra śakti-sañcāra-kṛta-sevakatve pramāṇaṃ manaḥ-śikṣāyāṃ (7,12) yadīccher
GR14sadhdipu:5449: āvāsaṃ vraja-bhuvi sa-rāgaṃ pratijanuḥ ity atraiva, sa-yūtha-śrī-rūpānuga iha
GR14sadhdipu:5453: atha śrī-jīva-gosvāmi-pādaḥ śrīmad-rūpa-pādasya bhrātuṣputras tasmāt taṃ
GR14sadhdipu:5454: mantra-sevakaṃ kṛtavān | tasya tu śrīman-mahāprabhor darśanaṃ nāsti śrīmad-
GR14sadhdipu:5455: rūpādīnām aprakaṭe parakīyātvaṃ svakīyātvaṃ ca mataṃ sva-granthe likhitaṃ tena
GR14sadhdipu:5457: śrī-rūpādi-saṅgino'naṅgī-kṛtavantaḥ | śrī-jīva-pādasya tat tu svecchā-likhanaṃ na
GR14sadhdipu:5459: paṇḍita-janās tat svīkurvanti | ye ca labdha-śrī-mahāprabhu-kṛpā labdha-śrī-
GR14sadhdipu:5460: rūpādi-kṛpās te tu sarvathā nāṅgīkurvanti | etan-mata-pravartanaṃ tu kāla-kṛtam
GR14sadhdipu:5461: eva | tat tu sarvaṃ kāla-kṛtam manye ity ādi | śreyāṃsi bahu-vighnāni ity ādi ca |
GR14sadhdipu:5462: atas tu kecid evaṃ vadanti śrī-jīva-pādas tu bhrātuṣputra eva śiṣyaś ca | tan-mataṃ
GR14sadhdipu:5463: svakīyātvam eva | tasmāt brūyuḥ snigdhasya śiṣyasya guravo guhyam apy uta (1.1.8)
GR14sadhdipu:5464: ity-ādi-nyāyena śrīmad-rūpa-pāda-mataṃ svakīyātvam eva | evaṃ cet śrīman-
GR14sadhdipu:5465: mahāprabhoḥ pārṣadeṣu viruddhaṃ jātam | śrīman-mahāprabhuṇā tu śrīmad-
GR14sadhdipu:5466: rūpa-sanātanau prati svakīyātvam upadiṣṭam | anyeṣu tu parakīyātvam
GR14sadhdipu:5467: upadiṣṭam iti gurutaraṃ viruddhaṃ syāt | śrīmad-rūpa-gosvāmi-pādānāṃ śakti-
GR14sadhdipu:5469: jīva-gosvāmi-pāda-gaṇa-madhye kvacit kvacid guru-viruddham āścaryaṃ dṛśyate
GR14sadhdipu:5470: | yato'dyāpi teṣu santāneṣu evaṃ śiṣyeṣu sva-sva-grantheṣu prakaṭe'prakaṭe ca
GR14sadhdipu:5471: parakīyātvaṃ dṛśyate | tasmāt śrīman-mahāprabhos tat-pārṣadādīnāṃ ca
GR14sadhdipu:5472: parakīyātvam eva matam | śrīmaj-jīva-pādena tu yat svakīyātvaṃ likhitam tat
GR14sadhdipu:5474: prārthanayā svayam eva kṣamāpitaḥ | tathā hi-
GR14sadhdipu:5475: yad etat tu mayā kṣudratareṇa taralāyitaṃ |
GR14sadhdipu:5477: tatra śiṣya-paramparā-śravaṇam āha-gopāla-dāsa-nāmā ko'pi vaiśyaḥ śrī-jīva-
GR14sadhdipu:5479: siddhāntitam | ataeva śrīmad-rūpa-sanātana-pādādīnāṃ grantheṣu kutra kutrāpi
GR14sadhdipu:5480: chedanādikaṃ kṛtam | kṛtvāpi tatra tatrāpi sva-doṣa-kṣamāpaṇaṃ kṛtam | yathā
GR14sadhdipu:5481: śrī-kṛṣṇa-sandarbhe yad etat tu mayā kṣudratameṇa taralāyitam | śrī-laghu-
GR14sadhdipu:5485: abuddhyā buddhyā vā yad iha mayakālekhi sahasā
GR14sadhdipu:5486: tathī̀a yad vācchedi dvayam api saheran param api |
GR14sadhdipu:5487: aho kiṃ vā yad yan manasi mama visphoritam abhūd
GR14sadhdipu:5488: ambhobhis tan mātraṃ yadi balam alaṃ śaṅkita-kulaiḥ ||
GR14sadhdipu:5489: harināmāmṛte tan-nāma spaṣṭam evoṭṭaṅkitam | tad yathā-
GR14sadhdipu:5491: ubhayatra mama mitraṃ sa bhavatu gopāla-dāsākhyaḥ ||
GR14sadhdipu:5494: bhavatu samantād eṣā nāmnā gopāla-campūr yā ||
GR14sadhdipu:5496: svecchayā likhitaṃ kiñcit kiñcid atra parecchayā |
GR14sadhdipu:5497: yat pūrvāpara-sambandhaṃ tat pūrvam aparaṃ param ||
GR14sadhdipu:5504: śrī-kṛṣṇa-dāsa-nāmā brāhmaṇo gauḍīyaḥ śrīmaj-jīva-vidyādhyayane śiṣyaḥ, na
GR14sadhdipu:5505: tu mantra-śiṣyaḥ | teṣāṃ śiṣyākaraṇāt | śiṣya-karaṇe pravṛttiś cet tarhi śrīnivāsa-
GR14sadhdipu:5506: narottamādīnāṃ śiṣyatvaṃ śrī-jīvena katham atyāji | tasmāt teṣv aprakaṭeṣu
GR14sadhdipu:5508: | teṣāṃ grantheṣu chedanādi kutra kṛtaṃ, kutrāpi pallavitam |
GR14sadhdipu:5509: ataeva śrī-vaiṣṇava-toṣaṇy-ādiṣu kutra kutrāpi saṃśayāspadatvena na sarva-
GR14sadhdipu:5510: saṃmatam | tasmād ekasyāprāmāṇyenāny asyāprāmāṇyam iti nyāyāt svakīyātva-
GR14sadhdipu:5512: tu parāpekṣā-kṛtena ca parakīyātvaṃ sarva-saṃmataṃ matam iti saṅgatam |
GR14sadhdipu:5520: tatrādau suṣṭhu vaiśiṣṭyam asyāḥ kathayituṃ sphuṭam |
GR14sadhdipu:5521: lakṣaṇaṃ kriyate bhakter uttamāyāḥ satāṃ matam ||
GR14sadhdipu:5532: dīyamānaṃ na gṛhṇanti vinā mat-sevanaṃ janāḥ ||
GR14sadhdipu:5541: dviśaḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ padair etan māhātyaṃ parikīrtitam ||
GR14sadhdipu:5544: yuktis tu kevalā naiva yad asyā apratiṣṭhatā ||
GR14sadhdipu:5549: sā bhaktiḥ sādhanaṃ bhāvaḥ premā ceti tridhoditā ||
GR14sadhdipu:5554: vaidhī rāgānugā ceti sā dvidhā sādhanābhidhā ||
GR14sadhdipu:5557: śāsanenaiva śāstrasya sā vaidhī bhaktir ucyate ||
GR14sadhdipu:5559: tasmād bhārata sarvātmā bhagavān īśvaro hariḥ |
GR14sadhdipu:5563: nātisakto na vairāgya-bhāg asyām adhikāry asau ||
GR14sadhdipu:5570: ṭīkā-abhivyaktaṃ suvyaktaṃ yathā syāt tathā vraja-vāsi-janādiṣu virājantīṃ
GR14sadhdipu:5571: rāgātmikāṃ bhaktim anusṛtā yā bhaktiḥ | yā rāgānugā ucyate iti yojanā | vraja-
GR14sadhdipu:5572: vāsi-janādiṣv ity atra jana-padena manuṣya-mātraṃ bodhitam | ādi-padena paśu-
GR14sadhdipu:5576: virājantīm iti viśeṣeṇa rājamānām, na tu dhāmāntara-parivāra-bhaktivad aiśvarya-
GR14sadhdipu:5579: evānugatyam iti phalitārthaḥ | tac ca tad-anugatatve sati tādṛśa-kāya-vāṅ-
GR14sadhdipu:5582: tasmād guruṃ prapadyeta jijñāsuḥ śreya uttamam |
GR14sadhdipu:5583: śābde pare ca niṣṇātaṃ brahmaṇy upaśamāśrayam ||
GR14sadhdipu:5584: ṭīkā ca-uttamaṃ śreyo jijñāsuḥ | śābde brahmaṇi vedākhye niṣṇātaṃ, anyathā
GR14sadhdipu:5585: saṃśaya-nirāsakatvāyogyatvād dhetoḥ | pare brahmaṇi aparokṣānubhave ca
GR14sadhdipu:5586: niṣṇātam | anyathā yato bodha-saṃcārābhāvāt | pare brahmaṇi niṣṇātatve
GR14sadhdipu:5591: ṭīkā-ādyo'dharaḥ | tat-sandhānaṃ ca tayor madhyamaṃ manthana-kāṣṭhāṃ
GR14sadhdipu:5592: pravacanam upadeśaḥ | vidyā śāstrotthaṃ jñātam | tatra sandhau bhavo'gnir iva |
GR14sadhdipu:5593: tathā ca śrutiḥ-ācāryaṃ pūrva-rūpaḥ antevāsy uttara-rūpaḥ ity ādi | ataeva tad-
GR14sadhdipu:5594: vijñānārthaṃ sa gurum evābhigacchet iti | ācāryavān puruṣo veda iti | naiṣā tarkeṇa
GR14sadhdipu:5600: nitya-siddhasya bhāvasya prākaṭyaṃ hṛdi sādhyatā (BRS 1.2.2) iti nitya-siddhasya
GR14sadhdipu:5601: bhāvasya sādhaka-bhaktānāṃ hṛdi svayaṃ prakaṭanaṃ sādhyatā | tat-tad-bhāvādi-

GR14sadhdipu:5606: skhalann antaḥ-phullo dadhad atipṛthuṃ vepathum api |

GR14sadhdipu:5609: atha śravaṇa-guru-bhajana-śikṣā-gurvoḥ prāyikam ekatvam iti | yathā tathaivāha
GR14sadhdipu:5612: amāyayānuvṛttyā yais tuṣyed ātmātma-do hariḥ || (BhP 11.2.21) iti |
GR14sadhdipu:5616: ya iha yatanti yantum ati-lolam upāya-khidaḥ |
GR14sadhdipu:5619: ṭīkā-ye guroś caraṇaṃ samavahāān āśrityātilola-madāntam adamitaṃ mana eva
GR14sadhdipu:5620: turagaṃ durgama-sāmyād vijitair indriyaiḥ prāṇaiś ca yantuṃ bhagavad-
GR14sadhdipu:5621: antarmukhīkartuṃ prayatante | te upāya-khidas teṣu teṣūpāyeṣu khidyante | ato
GR14sadhdipu:5622: vyasana-śatānvitā bhavanti | ataeva iha saṃsāra-samudre santi tiṣṭhanti duḥkham
GR14sadhdipu:5623: eva prāpnuvantīty arthaḥ | jaladhau akṛta-karṇadharā asvīkṛta-nāvikā vaṇijo yathā
GR14sadhdipu:5626: sati tat-kṛpayā vyasanānabhibhūtau ca satyāṃ śīghram eva mano niścalaṃ bhavatīti
GR14sadhdipu:5629: guru-bhaktyā sa milati smaraṇāt sevyate budhaiḥ |
GR14sadhdipu:5632: vaiṣṇavaṃ jñāna-vaktāraṃ yo vidyād viṣṇuvad gurum |

GR14sadhdipu:5634: śloka-pādasya vaktāpi yaḥ pūjyaḥ sa sadaiva hi |
GR14sadhdipu:5635: kiṃ punar bhagavad-viṣṇoḥ svarūpaṃ vitanoti yaḥ || ity ādi |
GR14sadhdipu:5636: tasmāt śrī-guror āvaśyakatvam | tac-caraṇāvalambanaṃ vinā premotpattir na
GR14sadhdipu:5642: madhu-lobhād yathā bhṛṅgaḥ puṣpāt puṣpāntaraṃ vrajet |
GR14sadhdipu:5643: jñāna-lobhāt tathā śiṣyo guror gurv-antaraṃ vrajet ||
GR14sadhdipu:5646: yuva-dvandvaṃ tac cet paricartium ārād abhilaṣeḥ |
GR14sadhdipu:5647: svarūpaṃ śrī-rūpaṃ sa-gaṇam iha tasyāgrajam api
GR14sadhdipu:5648: sphuṭaṃ premṇā nityaṃ smara nama tadā tvaṃ śṛṇu manaḥ ||
GR14sadhdipu:5656: ata etādṛśānugatyaṃ vinā śrī-nandanandanasya tathāvidha-svarūpa-prāptir na

GR14sadhdipu:5660: ācinoti yaḥ śāstrārthān svācāraiḥ sthāpayaty api |
GR14sadhdipu:5661: svayam ācarate yasmāt tasmād ācārya ucyate ||
GR14sadhdipu:5668: na japo nārcanaṃ naiva dhyānaṃ nāpi vidhi-kramaḥ |
GR14sadhdipu:5671: nāyikānāṃ ca sarvāsāṃ madhyā śreṣṭhatamā matā |
GR14sadhdipu:5672: prāyaḥ sarva-rasotkarṣo madhyāyām eva yujyate || ity ādi |
GR14sadhdipu:5673: darśitam eva | kiṃ ca-tvadīyatā-madīyatā-madhyayor madhye madīyatā śreṣṭhā
GR14sadhdipu:5676: na dātavyā na prakāśyā jane tv anadhikāriṇi ||
GR14sadhdipu:5678: māṃ ca gopaya yena syāt sṛṣṭir eṣottarottarā | iti |
